Headline: #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lake Park/55th
ShortDescription: Southbound 15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Park, 51st, Hyde Park and 55th: due to, street blockage near Lake Park/55th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Park, 51st, Hyde Park and 55th: due to, street blockage near Lake Park/55th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
